author: dildick
body:
* LUTs to map wiregroup onto min and max half-strip number that it crosses in ME1/1. 
* LUTs for 16 partition GE21. 
* Split GEMCSC LUTs by layer. 
* Move to subdirectories (similar files ending in .mem)
   * CCLUT
      * CSCComparatorCodePatternConversionLUT_pat0_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePatternConversionLUT_pat1_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePatternConversionLUT_pat2_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePatternConversionLUT_pat3_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePatternConversionLUT_pat4_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat0_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat0_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat1_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat1_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat2_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat2_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat3_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat3_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat4_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodePosOffsetLUT_pat4_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat0_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat0_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat1_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat1_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat2_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat2_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat3_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat3_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat4_float_v1.txt
      * CSCComparatorCodeSlopeLUT_pat4_v1.txt  
   * GEMCSC
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME1a_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME1a_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME1b_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME1b_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_es_ME21_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME1a_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME1a_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME1b_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME1b_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_pad_hs_ME21_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_max_wg_ME11_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_max_wg_ME11_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_max_wg_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_max_wg_ME21_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_min_wg_ME11_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_min_wg_ME11_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_min_wg_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l1_min_wg_ME21_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_max_wg_ME11_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_max_wg_ME11_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_max_wg_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_max_wg_ME21_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_min_wg_ME11_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_min_wg_ME11_odd.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_min_wg_ME21_even.txt
      * GEMCSCLUT_roll_l2_min_wg_ME21_odd.txt
   * ME11
      * CSCLUT_wg_max_hs_ME1a.txt
      * CSCLUT_wg_max_hs_ME1a_ganged.txt
      * CSCLUT_wg_max_hs_ME1b.txt
      * CSCLUT_wg_min_hs_ME1a.txt
      * CSCLUT_wg_min_hs_ME1a_ganged.txt
      * CSCLUT_wg_min_hs_ME1b.txt
      
FYI @tahuang1991.
title: Update of ME1/1 LUTs. GEM-CSC LUTs with M9 GE2/1 geometry
